column1: length ball on leg, and clipped away to midwicket
length ball on middle, and defended back to the bowler
fuller on middle, and whipped away to cow corner for the day's first runs
length ball on middle and angling in, clipped to midwicket but straight to the fielder
full on middle, and Bryant skips down the ground to hammer a lofted shot right over long on! Sweet bat swing
full and flat from Manenti. Driven down the ground to long on
length ball angling in, Bryant backs away to cut. Beats point, and the ball races away for four!
hammered! Full on middle, and he makes room before smashing this right over the bowler's head
length ball angling in, and cut straight to point
angling in again, and Bryant slaps a cut past the infield for four more
full on off and Bryant skips down the wicket to meet this ball. Swings across the line, and deposits this at deep midwicket!
good length on off, and clipped off the back foot to deep midwicket
big mood! Full toss on leg stump, and he flicks this off his pads past short third man
slower ball, but wrong line. Full outside leg stump, and Bryant misses the flick off his toes
length ball on middle. And angling away further. He shapes up to cut, but can't get bat on ball
leg-stump line again, and cramps Bryant for space. Hits his pad and dribbles away to square leg
full on off, and Heazlett shapes up to drive. Minimal movement of the feet, and that's been inside-edged onto his stumps!
full on leg stump, and blocked back to the bowler
short and wide from Curran. Bryant shapes up to hammer a cut-shot, but he misses
slower ball on off, and Bryant muscles a straight drive right past the bowler! Mid off is too wide, and the ball beats him too
length ball on off, and too close to his body for the cut. Mistimed to point
full on middle, and Bryant can't resist. Looks to clear the ground again, but this time the lofted shot goes straight down long on. An entertaining innings comes to a close
back of a length on off, and firmly defended off the back foot
another length ball on off, and he rides the ball to fend off the back foot
back of a length on leg stump, and McCullum looks to nudge it square on the leg side. But he's slow onto the shot, and the ball hits his thigh-guard before popping onto the leg side
full toss on leg stump, and that's been clipped away to deep backward square leg. McCullum calls for the second, and they comfortably jog back
full on middle, with a hint of inswing. The attempted drive finds the bat's inside edge, and rolls away to the leg side
full and wide on off stump. Allows Baz to free his arms, and he crunches a cover drive to the outfielder in the deep
back of a length on off, and he rides the bounce to fend off the back foot. They scamper across for a single
full on off stump, and he taps this away to cover with soft hands to pinch a single
appeal for lbw turned down. Full on leg stump, and the ball hits his pads while he tries to nudge behind square. Definitely would've gone down leg
just over mid off! Full on middle, but Lynn stays on the ball's leg-side, before lifting this juuuust over the infield. Not off the bat's middle by any distance
full ball angling in, and driven to long-on for a jogging single
slower ball from Curran. Well disguised, and McCullum allows the ball to come to him, before defending with soft hands
full on leg stump, and the slower ball has been tucked away - off his gloves - to square leg
full and straight to end the over. Drilled to long on by Lynn this time
teasing delivery outside off stump, and driven straight to long off for a walking single. Slight turn away after pitching
length ball outside off, and tapped to point off the back foot
full on middle, and angling down leg stump. Lynn tries to bunt it towards the leg side, but the ball hits his legs
length ball outside off, and cut off the back foot. Finds the fielder at point
fuller outside off, and he leans forward to drive through the covers
full just outside off, and McCullum tries to open the bat's face to run this fine. But he can only steer this to point
nice line first up. Back of a length delivery on middle, and Lynn stays on the back foot to block
length ball outside off, and Lynn flat-bats a pull right past Abbott's right. Ball rolls away to long off
length ball on middle, and he raises his front leg to pull along the ground. Deep backward square cleans up
full just outside off, and the cover drive is inside-edged through to square leg
full on off, and Lynn clears his front leg to slog. But it's come off the bat's inside-half! Rolls down to long on
straight to backward point! Length ball just outside off, and not too wide enough to cut. Looks to slap this over point, but the fielder dives forward to complete the catch
length ball on off, and he makes room to cut off the back foot. Protection in the deep
flighted full on off stump. Driven to cover
length ball on off stump, and Burns backs away to cut off the back foot
length ball on off, and he taps this off the back foot to point
full just outside off, and he leans forward to tap this away to cover
full and wide outside off stump, and he stretches to drive. Mistimed to cover on this occasion

dropped by Menenti! Full on middle, and Lynn looks to swat this over deep midwicket. Not timed well enough, and the fielder near the boundary sees the ball late. By the time he gets under it, he's made a mess of the chance
length ball outside off, and punched through the covers to the fielder in the deep
full on middle, and Burns looks to muscle this towards the leg side. Mistimed over mid-on, but lands before the fielder at long-on can get there
back of a length on off, but Lynn chooses to pull out of the pull shot
length ball on leg stump trying to cramp Lynn. But the ball goes down the leg side
length ball outside off, and Lynn skips down the ground to go towards the leg side. But the ball takes an under-edge and dribbles away to fine leg
length ball on the fourth-stump line. Extra bounce forces Burns to miss the attempted cut
slider on middle stump from round the wicket. Driven to long off
biggie! Full on leg stump, and Lynn skips down the wicket. Swings through the ball's line, and that's been well connected. Over long on
length ball on middle, and angling across Lynn. He backs away to make a bit more room, and the cut beats the man at point!
full on middle, and he goes leg side again. Swings hard, but mistimed to deep backward square this time
back of a length delivery on leg stump. Burns checks his shot after skipping down the ground. Nudged to square leg
overpitched outside off, and Lynn slaps this to deep point for a couple more. A 16-run over
length ball just outside off, and he makes room to steer a cut-shot to the sweeper-fielder
length ball wide outside off, and cut to deep point
straight back to the bowler! Wide outside off, and Burns tries to smack this over the bowler. Toe-ends the shot, and O'Keefe jumps to collect a catch high above his head
defends the first ball. Full on off stump, and tapped away to cover
length ball angling down leg, but the ball clips his pads. Rolls away to short fine-leg
back of a length outside off, and that's been cut to deep point. Tidy over from SOK
tossed up on off stump, and he clears his front leg to drive straight down the ground to long off
bowled around the legs! Full on middle, and Cutting tries to paddle this past fine leg. But the ball turns after pitching, and the delivery has clipped leg stump!
full on leg stump, and driven gently down to long on for a walking single
full on middle, and once again struck down the ground to long on. They walk across for another single
worked off his pads to deep midwicket. Much slower from Denly
length ball just outside off, and punched with the straight back. Denly dives to his left to intercept, but the ball beats him
full just outside off, and Lynn drives with the angled bat to wide extra cover
full on middle stump, and he whips this - off his toes - to deep midwicket. Good use of the bottom-hand
full outside off, and driven to wide long-off this time. SOK bowling to his field
full on middle, and driven to long-on this time. Protection there at all times
length ball outside off, and Lynn cuts off the back foot to deep point
tossed up wide outside off stump, and Peirson reaches forward to drive to long-off. Six singles in the over
full and wide outside off stump, and Lynn leans into a square drive. Well-timed, but finds the fielder in the deep again
slower ball, back of a length, and Lynn clatters a pull-shot along the ground. Deep midwicket cleans up near the boundary
length ball on middle, and angling away from Lynn. He shapes up to cut, but misses completely
finds his range! Regular length ball on middle, and Lynn shuffles across to the off side, before hammering a pull over Silk at deep midwicket. First half-century of 2019!
length ball angling across once again, and slapped in front of square this time. Deep extra cover cleans up
length ball angling into his body. Lynn swivels to pull, but the ball stays low and hits his gut-region
back of a length outside off, and he pulls along the ground to deep midwicket. Hands Lynn the strike back
that's outta here! Full on middle, and he clears his front leg before swatting a lofted shot way over wide long-on! Raw power, right in his arc. Superb shot
back of a length outside off, and this time Lynn picks the slower ball early. Waits for the delivery to get to him, before cutting a fine shot to the third-man boundary
back of a length on off, and Lynn flat-bats a pulled shot to long on
back of a length outside off, and Peirson misses out on the cut. Extra bounce takes it over his blade
starts off with a slower ball. Full just outside off, and Lynn checks his shot. Tapped away to point
yorker on middle, but Lynn manages to squirt this away to deep backward square. Work for the outfielder, and they jog back for the third
slower ball, wide outside off stump. He checks his shot, before driving to long off for a walking single
pulled! Just a gentle length ball, but Lynn absolutely muscles this over the boundary. Picks the slower ball early and sends this into the stands
slower ball again, but overpitched wide outside off. Lynn drills a cover drive for a couple more to the Heat total
back of a length outside off, and extra bounce takes it over Lynn's head. Can't ramp it over the keeper!
full on middle stump, and he offers the bat's full face. Driven past the non-striker to long off
full on off stump from round the wicket, and Lynn cues up to hit this over extra cover. Slices the shot, and the ball's in the air, but falls just short of the diving point fielder
overpitched wide outside off stump. Lynn tries to squirt it away to third man but misses
full on middle, and he shuffles across to the off side, before slogging to deep midwicket
length ball angling across the batsman, and that's been cut like a fruit ninja right over backward point!
works this away to deep midwicket
length ball on off, and angling inwards. Check-slogs into the leg side, and wide long-on intercepts
whoa! Full on leg stump, but that's too easy for Lynn. Makes room exposing all three stumps, and then lifts this over long-on so nonchalantly
full ball aimed at his toes. Lynn misses the bat swing, and it hits his front leg. Ball rolls away to the leg side

he joins in! Full toss on leg stump, but Pierson had already shuffled across to play the paddle. Changes his shot, going for a proper swing of the bat instead, and that's been clattered over deep backward square leg!
a well-directed yorker from Abbott. Full and fast outside leg stump. Pierson's shovels this right onto his boots before they take off for a single
full outside leg stump once again, and Lynn hammers a straight drive to wide long on
yorker at the base of leg stump, and Lynn squirts this to short fine-leg for a single
full and swinging inwards. Mistimed to wide long on

full on middle, and Lynn tries to ramp this over short fine leg. He misses, and the ball hits his front leg. Impact in front of middle stump, and that's been given lbw. An entertaining innings comes to an end
slower ball first up. Length ball on middle, and bouncing just over middle stump as Pattinson can't connect with the pull
full on middle, and driven to deep midwicket
yes he can! Length ball on off, and his attempted pull comes off the bat's bottom half. In the air as it goes straight to the fielder at cow corner. Brisbane Heat make 164 for 7
swinging delivery, full on middle stump. Defended back to the bowler off the front foot
length ball just outside off. Angling further away, and left alone
full on middle, and coming into his pads. Drives firmly towards the on-side, and that beats midwicket! Chase for the fielder, but he manages to pull the ball back
length ball on leg stump, and that's been tapped off the back foot to point. Nice, early call for the single
length ball outside off, and this time it stays low. Avendano tries to punch through the covers, but the ball's gone way below his bat
full on off, and swinging away from the batsman. He offers the bat's full face, and hammers a drive teasingly over the fielder at cover!
full outside off, and turning inwards. Defended after taking a bit stride forward
length ball on off stump, and nudged off the back foot to midwicket
full on off stump, and he goes for an expansive cover drive. Done in by the drift, and he inside-edges the shot onto his pads
length ball outside off, and cut off the back foot to point. Can't beat the infielder
length ball on leg stump, and he tries to work it to the leg side. Hits his pad and rolls away to square leg
length ball on middle, and he tries to pull off the back foot. But the ball's turning into the batsman, and he mistimes the shot to square leg. Maiden over
full outside off stump, and he tries to play the cover drive. Plays it inside the line of the ball and the delivery flies past his outside edge to the keeper
length ball outside off stump, and that's the second time he misses the same shot. Ball doing a bit, seaming away after pitching, which is causing the batsman to play a false shot
full on middle, and this time he makes a wonderful connection! Lets the ball come into his pads, before absolutely whipping this over deep midwicket. Whattay shot
length ball outside off, but the ball is very slow. Deceived by the lack of pace, missing the square cut completely
full outside off stump, and he opens the bat's face to drive through the covers. But straight to the fielder
good length on off, slightly slower from Pattinson. Turned off his pads to square leg for a single
length ball on off stump, and he backs away to flat-bat a pulled shot down the ground
down on one knee! Overpitched outside off stump, and he swats this over Mujeeb's head! Hammered, smoked, choose your favourite adjective. Wowza
length ball outside off, and spinning inwards. Defended to cover
length ball outside off, and turning into his pads. Worked away to the leg side
length ball on middle name, and punched down the ground to long on
full on middle, and he makes room to hammer a drive. But stopped at cover!
length ball on middle, and he skips down the ground before throwing his bat at it. Sliced over short third man, and the fielder in the deep can't intercept either!
full on leg stump, and he misses the flick off his pads. Hits his front leg and rolls away to the leg side
length ball on middle stump, and that's been nudged off his pads to deep backward square leg
length ball on leg stump, and the ball comes into his pads. Tries to slog towards the leg side, and it hits his front leg and rolls away to third man
length ball just outside off, and he tries to steer it fine. But short third man intercepts!
length ball on leg stump, and he offers the bat's full face. Nudged away to point off the bat's outside half
full and wide outside off, but he's been deceived by the slower ball! Denly tries to muscle this over cover, but the ball is too wide for him, and he toe-ends the shot to the keeper's right
full on middle stump, and defended with the bat's open face to cover. They pinch a single
length ball outside off, but slower form Lalor. Avendano wants to hammer a cut, but he's completely done in by the (lack of) pace
length ball on middle, and he nudges it off the back foot to deep point for a single
slower ball again. Length ball on middle, and he punches to cover with gentle hands to collect a single
full outside off stump, and he walks across to the off side before playing a sweep behind square for four! Well placed
length ball on off, and nudged off his pads to the fielder at square leg for a quick run
full just outside off stump, and driven to cover
full just outside off, and flicked to the vacant midwicket region. Mujeeb goes chasing after it
tossed up wide outside off stump, and he clatters a straight drive past the bowler's left to long off
length ball on middle, and spinning inwards. Nudged off his pads to short fine leg
length ball on middle stump, and worked off his pads to the leg side
full on off stump, and tapped with soft hands to long off
length ball on leg stump, and flicked off his pads. Played fine, and that had four written all over it, but Mujeeb's dive at short fine leg saves a certain four!
length ball, wide outside off stump. Cut to point
length ball, wide outside off stump, and he slaps a cut to deep point once again
length ball on off stump, and pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
length ball on middle stump, and he puts this half-tracker away with disdain. Rocks back, goes deep, and pulls over to the square-leg boundary
full outside off stump, and spinning further away. He shoulders his arms, but not called a wide

wrong'un, length ball on middle, and Henriques pulls again. Burns - at deep midwicket - gets under the delivery in the deep, but just too much power from the batsman. Hits his hand, but falls over the boundary
length ball outside off stump, and cut off the back foot to the fielder in the deep
length ball outside off, and punched through the off side to the man in the deep
length ball on middle, and the pull takes a top edge! Right over the keeper, and a couple of bounces into the boundary
length ball outside off, and he stands tall to punch. Can't beat the infield though
full and wide outside off, and he tries to play the cover drive. But he's through his shot too early because of the slower ball, and he slices the shot between point and backward point
length ball on middle, and nudged away to square leg for a jogging single
length ball outside off, and he muscles a square cut to the fielder in the deep
full on off, and driven to midwicket for a quick single. Fielder runs in, and tries to effect a run-out, but misses
full just outside off, and he swings across the line. Mistimed to deep midwicket
length ball outside off, and he covers his off stump before punching straight down the ground. Long-on's there

almost a yorker, but wide outside off stump. Sliced to short third man, and they're off for a single. Fielder at short third man has a throw at the bowler's end, and that's a direct hit! Batsman's reaction makes me feel he's gone, and yes, replays say that so! He was jogging into the crease, and didn't see the ball sneak in. His bat and feet are in the air, and that's a wicket for Brisbane Heat. Lazy running, excellent throw
length ball angling in, and he helps this on the way to fine leg. Played uppishly, but on the bounce
length ball just outside off, and punched off the back foot to cover
full on middle, and he clips this off his toes to the leg side. Stopped by midwicket
full and wide outside off stump. And that's been hammered through the off-side to the fielder in the deep

beautiful delivery! What flight and turn. Full outside off, and turning into the batsman. He goes for an expansive cover drive, but the ball goes through him, and he's dragged his foot out as well. Comfortably stumped
length ball sliding in. Looks to defend, but tapped away to square leg off the bat's inside half
tossed up outside off stump, and driven away from his body to cover
length ball outside off stump, and pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
full and wide outside off stump, and he steers a shot to deep point
length ball on leg stump, and tapped away to mid off for a quick single. Easily completed
length ball on middle, and angling away from the batsman. Pulled along the ground to deep midwicket

full and wide outside off, and he leans forward for a drive. Toe-ends it to cover, and the fielder drops it diving to his left! Looked super tough, an outstanding effort for certain, but that was the wicket Heat needed
length ball outside off, and steered to cover off the front foot
full and wide outside off stump, and driven through the covers, but Pattinson - once again - dives to his left to intercept. Single-handedly saved atleast four runs for his team in this over
full on leg stump, and he's down on one knee to sweep. Slugged over deep backward square!
length ball on middle, and tapped away to midwicket. They want a double, but the fielder from the deep runs in and forces the batsmen to change their minds
full on off stump, and he backs away to drive. Stopped at cover
length ball on le stump, and he's down on one knee to pull along the ground. Man there in the deep
length ball outside off, and spinning away. Backs away to cut, but that's been intercepted by backward point
half-tracker skidding through on middle stump. Punched to long off. Sixers need 67 off six overs
full on leg stump, and turned off his toes to deep midwicket for a couple
full on leg stump, and clipped off his pads behind square on the leg side. Intercepted by the fielder in the deep
length ball, wide outside off, and extra bounce forces Henriques to miss the cut
slower ball, full outside off, and he slices a cover drive over backward point! Third man's there for protection though
full toss on leg stump, and clipped away past the square-leg umpire, to the fielder in the deep
smoked! Into the second tier. Full and wide outside off, but Henriques drags this from outside the stumps and hammers a slog over wide long on. Oof. What a way to get to fifty
length ball wide outside off, and he drags a flat-batted pull down to wide long on
length ball, wide outside off stump again. He makes room to cut off the back foot
length ball just outside off, and the skidder is pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
just over! Tossed up outside off, and Silk goes for it. Slog-sweeps across the line, and that's beaten two men in the deep on the leg side
length ball outside off, and spinning inwards. Tapped away to cover with soft hands
full just outside off, and he skips down the ground, before chipping a relatively safe shot over Silk's head. Lands a few metres before the fielder at long-on
full on off stump, and Henriques looks to clear the long-off boundary. But he's toe-ended the shot, and long off runs forward to complete an easy catch. Cutting is pumped too!
length ball, delivered very wide outside off stump, and he smokes a cut-shot to the fielder at deep point
full on middle, and this has some late inswing. Clipped off his toes to deep midwicket, and the new batsman has no trouble in returning for the second run. Fresh legs, gas in the tank
length ball on middle, and nudged off his toes to deep backward square again. They go for the double once more, and a misfield from the keeper allows them to steal a third as well!

unlucky! Or lucky, depending on which team you're rooting for. Full and wide, and Silk absolutely goes hell-for-leather trying to hit it over cover. But the ball's taken an edge, and goes just past the keeper's right for four
full and wide outside off. An offcutter from Cutting. Driven square to the fielder in the deep
length ball, wide outside off, but Silk has picked this delivery. Goes down on one knee, and flat-bats a shot over long on! Just what was needed first ball of the over
full on middle stump, and pulled along the ground to deep midwicket for a single

full on off stump, and he skips down the ground to meet this ball. Swings across the line and mistimes it to deep backward square. Just a single there, but a fluffed effort in the deep allows them to pinch a second
length ball outside off, and muscled off the back foot to wide long-on
full outside off, and Silk makes room before freeing his arms. Well placed, between deep extra cover and long off, but the fielders manage to converge and stop the boundary
length ball on middle stump, and pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
length ball, wide outside off, and he drags a sweep to deep midwicket
audacious! Full on off stump, but he shuffles across and mistimes a paddle-ramp past the keeper's left. Takes a tumble while completing the shot, but he's got a smile on his face by the end of it
yorker just outside off, and he opens the bat's face to play to point
full on off, and he's picked the spot beautifully! Uses the wrists to maneuver this over the square-leg umpire, and there's no protection near there
length ball outside off, and he clubs a flat-batted shot right over the non-striker! Long off tries to cut it off, but he can't because the shot is too damn straight!
full on middle, and he looks to slog towards the leg side. Top-edges it, and the keeper gets under it! The set batsman is out. Twist in the tale?
full outside off, and he swings across the line to hammer a shot towards deep midwicket
waist-high full toss outside off stump, and he smokes this right over cover! Scores tied. What a gift.
yorker on leg stump, and he squeezes it away to short fine leg. Misfield from Mujeeb, and Sydney Sixers start their 2019 on a winning note!
